title: Bug Splat most days i log in + everytime there's an update
body:
Hi, i posted this before but got basic support suggestions like use hextech repair tool, reinstall and verifying files etc. I tried all these methods prior to the support discussion with no success. 
What's happening is i get a bugsplat report most days i log in, so i have to restart my computer constantly. Furthermore, whenever there's an update it gets stuck on 100% "applying patches" without progressing. 
This is quite an irritating issue i've had for a few months now and wondering if there's a known solution.
Thanks
Catspeare {{champion:432}}
